name: Abilities
description: Abilities provide passive effects for Pokémon in battle or in the overworld. Pokémon have multiple possible abilities but can have only one ability at a time. Check out [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Ability) for greater detail.

effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target [flinch]{mechanic:flinch} with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect.

This ability does not stack with a held item.

Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon [flinch]{mechanic:flinch} with each hit.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: is_main_series
fields.description: Whether or not this ability originated in the main series of the video games.

fields.name: generation
fields.description: The generation this ability originated in.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: effect_entries
fields.description: The effect of this ability listed in different languages.

fields.name: effect_changes
fields.description: The list of previous effects this ability has had across version groups.

fields.name: flavor_text_entries
fields.description: The flavor text of this ability listed in different languages.

fields.name: pokemon
fields.description: A list of Pokémon that could potentially have this ability.

fields.name: effect_entries
fields.description: The previous effect of this ability listed in different languages.

fields.name: version_group
fields.description: The version group in which the previous effect of this ability originated.

fields.name: flavor_text
fields.description: The localized name for an API resource in a specific language.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The language this text resource is in.

fields.name: version_group
fields.description: The version group that uses this flavor text.

fields.name: is_hidden
fields.description: Whether or not this a hidden ability for the referenced Pokémon.

fields.name: slot
fields.description: Pokémon have 3 ability 'slots' which hold references to possible abilities they could have. This is the slot of this ability for the referenced pokemon.

fields.name: pokemon
fields.description: The Pokémon this ability could belong to.

name: Characteristics
description: Characteristics indicate which stat contains a Pokémon's highest IV. A Pokémon's Characteristic is determined by the remainder of its highest IV divided by 5 (gene_modulo). Check out [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Characteristic) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: gene_modulo
fields.description: The remainder of the highest stat/IV divided by 5.

fields.name: possible_values
fields.description: The possible values of the highest stat that would result in a Pokémon recieving this characteristic when divided by 5.

name: Egg Groups
description: Egg Groups are categories which determine which Pokémon are able to interbreed. Pokémon may belong to either one or two Egg Groups. Check out [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Egg_Group) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: pokemon_species
fields.description: A list of all Pokémon species that are members of this egg group.

name: Genders
description: Genders were introduced in Generation II for the purposes of breeding Pokémon but can also result in visual differences or even different evolutionary lines. Check out [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Gender) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: pokemon_species_details
fields.description: A list of Pokémon species that can be this gender and how likely it is that they will be.

fields.name: required_for_evolution
fields.description: A list of Pokémon species that required this gender in order for a Pokémon to evolve into them.

fields.name: rate
fields.description: The chance of this Pokémon being female, in eighths; or -1 for genderless.

fields.name: pokemon_species
fields.description: A Pokémon species that can be the referenced gender.

name: Growth Rates
description: Growth rates are the speed with which Pokémon gain levels through experience. Check out [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Experience) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: formula
fields.description: The formula used to calculate the rate at which the Pokémon species gains level.

fields.name: descriptions
fields.description: The descriptions of this characteristic listed in different languages.

fields.name: levels
fields.description: A list of levels and the amount of experienced needed to atain them based on this growth rate.

fields.name: pokemon_species
fields.description: A list of Pokémon species that gain levels at this growth rate.

fields.name: level
fields.description: The level gained.

fields.name: experience
fields.description: The amount of experience required to reach the referenced level.

name: Natures
description: Natures influence how a Pokémon's stats grow. See [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Nature) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: decreased_stat
fields.description: The stat decreased by 10% in Pokémon with this nature.

fields.name: increased_stat
fields.description: The stat increased by 10% in Pokémon with this nature.

fields.name: hates_flavor
fields.description: The flavor hated by Pokémon with this nature.

fields.name: likes_flavor
fields.description: The flavor liked by Pokémon with this nature.

fields.name: pokeathlon_stat_changes
fields.description: A list of Pokéathlon stats this nature effects and how much it effects them.

fields.name: move_battle_style_preferences
fields.description: A list of battle styles and how likely a Pokémon with this nature is to use them in the Battle Palace or Battle Tent.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: max_change
fields.description: The amount of change.

fields.name: pokeathlon_stat
fields.description: The stat being affected.

fields.name: low_hp_preference
fields.description: Chance of using the move, in percent, if HP is under one half.

fields.name: high_hp_preference
fields.description: Chance of using the move, in percent, if HP is over one half.

fields.name: move_battle_style
fields.description: The move battle style.

name: Pokeathlon Stats
description: Pokeathlon Stats are different attributes of a Pokémon's performance in Pokéathlons. In Pokéathlons, competitions happen on different courses; one for each of the different Pokéathlon stats. See [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pok%C3%A9athlon) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: affecting_natures
fields.description: A detail of natures which affect this Pokéathlon stat positively or negatively.

fields.name: increase
fields.description: A list of natures and how they change the referenced Pokéathlon stat.

fields.name: decrease
fields.description: A list of natures and how they change the referenced Pokéathlon stat.

fields.name: max_change
fields.description: The maximum amount of change to the referenced Pokéathlon stat.

fields.name: nature
fields.description: The nature causing the change.

name: Pokemon
description: Pokémon are the creatures that inhabit the world of the Pokémon games. They can be caught using Pokéballs and trained by battling with other Pokémon. See [Bulbapedia](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon_(species)) for greater detail.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: base_experience
fields.description: The base experience gained for defeating this Pokémon.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of this Pokémon in decimetres.

fields.name: is_default
fields.description: Set for exactly one Pokémon used as the default for each species.

fields.name: order
fields.description: Order for sorting. Almost national order, except families are grouped together.

fields.name: weight
fields.description: The weight of this Pokémon in hectograms.

fields.name: abilities
fields.description: A list of abilities this Pokémon could potentially have.

fields.name: forms
fields.description: A list of forms this Pokémon can take on.

fields.name: game_indices
fields.description: A list of game indices relevent to Pokémon item by generation.

fields.name: held_items
fields.description: A list of items this Pokémon may be holding when encountered.

fields.name: location_area_encounters
fields.description: A link to a list of location areas, as well as encounter details pertaining to specific versions.

fields.name: moves
fields.description: A list of moves along with learn methods and level details pertaining to specific version groups.

fields.name: sprites
fields.description: A set of sprites used to depict this Pokémon in the game.

fields.name: species
fields.description: The species this Pokémon belongs to.

fields.name: stats
fields.description: A list of base stat values for this Pokémon.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of details showing types this Pokémon has.

fields.name: is_hidden
fields.description: Whether or not this is a hidden ability.

fields.name: slot
fields.description: The slot this ability occupies in this Pokémon species.

fields.name: ability
fields.description: The ability the Pokémon may have.

fields.name: slot
fields.description: The order the Pokémon's types are listed in.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type the referenced Pokémon has.

fields.name: item
fields.description: The item the referenced Pokémon holds.

fields.name: version_details
fields.description: The details of the different versions in which the item is held.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The version in which the item is held.

fields.name: rarity
fields.description: How often the item is held.

fields.name: move
fields.description: The move the Pokémon can learn.

fields.name: version_group_details
fields.description: The details of the version in which the Pokémon can learn the move.

fields.name: move_learn_method
fields.description: The method by which the move is learned.

fields.name: version_group
fields.description: The version group in which the move is learned.

fields.name: level_learned_at
fields.description: The minimum level to learn the move.

fields.name: stat
fields.description: The stat the Pokémon has.

fields.name: effort
fields.description: The effort points (EV) the Pokémon has in the stat.

fields.name: base_stat
fields.description: The base value of the stat.

fields.name: front_default
fields.description: The default depiction of this Pokémon from the front in battle.

fields.name: front_shiny
fields.description: The shiny depiction of this Pokémon from the front in battle.

fields.name: front_female
fields.description: The female depiction of this Pokémon from the front in battle.

fields.description: The shiny female depiction of this Pokémon from the front in battle.

fields.name: back_default
fields.description: The default depiction of this Pokémon from the back in battle.

fields.name: back_shiny
fields.description: The shiny depiction of this Pokémon from the back in battle.

fields.name: back_female
fields.description: The female depiction of this Pokémon from the back in battle.

fields.name: back_shiny_female
fields.description: The shiny female depiction of this Pokémon from the back in battle.

fields.name: location_area
fields.description: The location area the referenced Pokémon can be encountered in.

fields.name: version_details
fields.description: A list of versions and encounters with the referenced Pokémon that might happen.

name: Pokémon Colors
description: Colors used for sorting Pokémon in a Pokédex. The color listed in the Pokédex is usually the color most apparent or covering each Pokémon's body. No orange category exists; Pokémon that are primarily orange are listed as red or brown.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: pokemon_species
fields.description: A list of the Pokémon species that have this color.

name: Pokémon Forms
description: Some Pokémon have the ability to take on different forms. At times, these differences are purely cosmetic and have no bearing on the difference in the Pokémon's stats from another; however, several Pokémon differ in stats (other than HP), type, and Ability depending on their form.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: order
fields.description: The order in which forms should be sorted within all forms. Multiple forms may have equal order, in which case they should fall back on sorting by name.

fields.name: form_order
fields.description: The order in which forms should be sorted within a species' forms.

fields.name: is_default
fields.description: True for exactly one form used as the default for each Pokémon.

fields.name: is_battle_only
fields.description: Whether or not this form can only happen during battle.

fields.name: is_mega
fields.description: Whether or not this form requires mega evolution.

fields.name: form_name
fields.description: The name of this form.

fields.name: pokemon
fields.description: The Pokémon that can take on this form.

fields.name: sprites
fields.description: A set of sprites used to depict this Pokémon form in the game.

fields.name: version_group
fields.description: The version group this Pokémon form was introduced in.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The form specific full name of this Pokémon form, or empty if the form does not have a specific name.

fields.name: form_names
fields.description: The form specific form name of this Pokémon form, or empty if the form does not have a specific name.

fields.name: front_default
fields.description: The default depiction of this Pokémon form from the front in battle.

fields.name: front_shiny
fields.description: The shiny depiction of this Pokémon form from the front in battle.

fields.name: back_default
fields.description: The default depiction of this Pokémon form from the back in battle.

fields.name: back_shiny
fields.description: The shiny depiction of this Pokémon form from the back in battle.

name: Pokémon Habitats
description: Habitats are generally different terrain Pokémon can be found in but can also be areas designated for rare or legendary Pokémon.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: pokemon_species
fields.description: A list of the Pokémon species that can be found in this habitat.

name: Pokémon Shapes
description: Shapes used for sorting Pokémon in a Pokédex.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: awesome_names
fields.description: The "scientific" name of this Pokémon shape listed in different languages.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: pokemon_species
fields.description: A list of the Pokémon species that have this shape.

fields.name: awesome_name
fields.description: The localized "scientific" name for an API resource in a specific language.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The language this "scientific" name is in.

name: Pokémon Species
description: A Pokémon Species forms the basis for at least one Pokémon. Attributes of a Pokémon species are shared across all varieties of Pokémon within the species. A good example is Wormadam; Wormadam is the species which can be found in three different varieties, Wormadam-Trash, Wormadam-Sandy and Wormadam-Plant.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

form_descriptions.description: Forms have different stats and movepools.  During evolution, Burmy's current cloak becomes Wormadam's form, and can no longer be changed.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: order
fields.description: The order in which species should be sorted. Based on National Dex order, except families are grouped together and sorted by stage.

fields.name: gender_rate
fields.description: The chance of this Pokémon being female, in eighths; or -1 for genderless.

fields.name: capture_rate
fields.description: The base capture rate; up to 255. The higher the number, the easier the catch.

fields.name: base_happiness
fields.description: The happiness when caught by a normal Pokéball; up to 255. The higher the number, the happier the Pokémon.

fields.name: is_baby
fields.description: Whether or not this is a baby Pokémon.

fields.name: hatch_counter
fields.description: Initial hatch counter: one must walk 255 × (hatch_counter + 1) steps before this Pokémon's egg hatches, unless utilizing bonuses like Flame Body's.

fields.name: has_gender_differences
fields.description: Whether or not this Pokémon has visual gender differences.

fields.name: forms_switchable
fields.description: Whether or not this Pokémon has multiple forms and can switch between them.

fields.name: growth_rate
fields.description: The rate at which this Pokémon species gains levels.

fields.name: pokedex_numbers
fields.description: A list of Pokedexes and the indexes reserved within them for this Pokémon species.

fields.name: egg_groups
fields.description: A list of egg groups this Pokémon species is a member of.

fields.name: color
fields.description: The color of this Pokémon for Pokédex search.

fields.name: shape
fields.description: The shape of this Pokémon for Pokédex search.

fields.name: evolves_from_species
fields.description: The Pokémon species that evolves into this Pokemon_species.

fields.name: evolution_chain
fields.description: The evolution chain this Pokémon species is a member of.

fields.name: habitat
fields.description: The habitat this Pokémon species can be encountered in.

fields.name: generation
fields.description: The generation this Pokémon species was introduced in.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: pal_park_encounters
fields.description: A list of encounters that can be had with this Pokémon species in pal park.

fields.name: flavor_text_entries
fields.description: A list of flavor text entries for this Pokémon species.

fields.name: form_descriptions
fields.description: Descriptions of different forms Pokémon take on within the Pokémon species.

fields.name: genera
fields.description: The genus of this Pokémon species listed in multiple languages.

fields.name: varieties
fields.description: A list of the Pokémon that exist within this Pokémon species.

fields.name: genus
fields.description: The localized genus for the referenced Pokémon species

fields.name: language
fields.description: The language this genus is in.

fields.name: entry_number
fields.description: The index number within the Pokédex.

fields.name: pokedex
fields.description: The Pokédex the referenced Pokémon species can be found in.

fields.name: base_score
fields.description: The base score given to the player when the referenced Pokémon is caught during a pal park run.

fields.name: rate
fields.description: The base rate for encountering the referenced Pokémon in this pal park area.

fields.name: area
fields.description: The pal park area where this encounter happens.

fields.name: is_default
fields.description: Whether this variety is the default variety.

fields.name: pokemon
fields.description: The Pokémon variety.

name: Stats
description: Stats determine certain aspects of battles. Each Pokémon has a value for each stat which grows as they gain levels and can be altered momentarily by effects in battles.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: game_index
fields.description: ID the games use for this stat.

fields.name: is_battle_only
fields.description: Whether this stat only exists within a battle.

fields.name: affecting_moves
fields.description: A detail of moves which affect this stat positively or negatively.

fields.name: affecting_natures
fields.description: A detail of natures which affect this stat positively or negatively.

fields.name: characteristics
fields.description: A list of characteristics that are set on a Pokémon when its highest base stat is this stat.

fields.name: move_damage_class
fields.description: The class of damage this stat is directly related to.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: increase
fields.description: A list of moves and how they change the referenced stat.

fields.name: decrease
fields.description: A list of moves and how they change the referenced stat.

fields.name: change
fields.description: The maximum amount of change to the referenced stat.

fields.name: move
fields.description: The move causing the change.

fields.name: increase
fields.description: A list of natures and how they change the referenced stat.

fields.name: decrease
fields.description: A list of nature sand how they change the referenced stat.

name: Types
description: Types are properties for Pokémon and their moves. Each type has three properties: which types of Pokémon it is super effective against, which types of Pokémon it is not very effective against, and which types of Pokémon it is completely ineffective against.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The identifier for this resource.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name for this resource.

fields.name: damage_relations
fields.description: A detail of how effective this type is toward others and vice versa.

fields.name: game_indices
fields.description: A list of game indices relevent to this item by generation.

fields.name: generation
fields.description: The generation this type was introduced in.

fields.name: move_damage_class
fields.description: The class of damage inflicted by this type.

fields.name: names
fields.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.

fields.name: pokemon
fields.description: A list of details of Pokémon that have this type.

fields.name: moves
fields.description: A list of moves that have this type.

fields.name: slot
fields.description: The order the Pokémon's types are listed in.

fields.name: pokemon
fields.description: The Pokémon that has the referenced type.

fields.name: no_damage_to
fields.description: A list of types this type has no effect on.

fields.name: half_damage_to
fields.description: A list of types this type is not very effect against.

fields.name: double_damage_to
fields.description: A list of types this type is very effect against.

fields.name: no_damage_from
fields.description: A list of types that have no effect on this type.

fields.name: half_damage_from
fields.description: A list of types that are not very effective against this type.

fields.name: double_damage_from
fields.description: A list of types that are very effective against this type.
